name: Simulator of Ukraine 1991
description:
This game is a global strategy, which is primarily focused on Ukraine after leaving the Soviet occupation. Here you will be given control of Ukraine with the opportunity to change history and intervene in the events of that time.
The main driver of the gameplay at the moment is the branch of tricks, performing which you will influence the game world. It is also possible to interact with the regions of other countries through the influence mechanic, increasing which you can buy or annex foreign territories. Well, it is clear that there is an opportunity to improve the regions that are already under your control by increasing the support of investors or the support of the population.
